Name: Barding (padded)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 11 + Dex modifier.

Name: Barding (leather)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 11 + Dex modifier.

Name: Barding (studded leather)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 12 + Dex modifier.

Name: Barding (hide)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 12 + Dex modifier (max 2).

Name: Barding (chain shirt)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 13 + Dex modifier (max 2).

Name: Barding (scale mail)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 14 + Dex modifier (max 2).

Name: Barding (breastplate)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 14 + Dex modifier (max 2).

Name: Barding (half plate)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 15 + Dex modifier (max 2).

Name: Barding (ring mail)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 14.

Name: Barding (chain mail)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 16. Strength required 13.

Name: Barding (splint)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 17. Strength required 15.

Name: Barding (plate)
Description: Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. AC 18. Strength required 15.

Name: Exotic saddle
Description: An exotic saddle is required for aquatic and flying mounts.

Name: Military saddle
Description: A military saddle braces the ride, helping you keep your seat on an active mount in battle. It gives you advantage on any check you make to remain mounted.
